# we-switch



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property             | Attribute     | Description                                                       | Type      | Default     |
| -------------------- | ------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked`            | `checked`     | Default value of switch when component is rendered the first time | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `labelLeft`          | `label-left`  | Text put in the left of switch                                    | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `labelRight`         | `label-right` | Text put in the right of switch                                   | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `value` _(required)_ | `value`       | Value of switch, put in the payload of changeCallback event       | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event            | Description                                                                                          | Type               |
| ---------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `switchCallback` | Event triggered any time user change the state of the switch putting in the payload value and status | `CustomEvent<any>` |


----------------------------------------------
